passives.name: Thorns
passives.effects: When struck by a basic attack [[on-hit]], deal {{as|10 magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: On being hit by a basic attack, deal 10 magic damage to the attacker.
If the attacker is a champion, apply Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
schema_notes.effects_structured_reviewed: Manual review: thorns damage + grievous wounds.
